programme.title: A DIOS MOMO
programme.desc: Little Obdulio sells newspapers on the street to bring home a few coins for his family. His life is altered when he befriends the night watchman of the newspaper, a magical "Maestro," who will not only introduce him to reading, but also teach him the real meaning of life, using the lyrics of the "Murgas" under the spell of the God MoMo during the mythical nights of the Uruguayan Carnival.

programme.title: PALM TREES DOWN 3RD ST.
programme.desc: While searching for her father, Nikki meets her half-sister Winter for the first time on the streets of San Francisco.

programme.title: Switch
programme.desc: A couple, Nessa and Camden, continue their tradition of looking through each others phones once a month, but questionable text messages reveal the truth.

programme.title: KASITA
programme.desc: When little Luna canâ€™t keep the dog sheâ€™s rescued, she knows just what to do. Together with her cousin, Sol, she sets off to house the dog in one of the empty old huts that held enslaved Africans on Bonaire. Things donâ€™t go as planned

programme.title: DARATT
programme.desc: When the government announces an amnesty for all war criminals, 16-year-old Atim's grandfather gives him a revolver and tells him to find his father's killer. The teenager loses no time in tracking him down.

programme.title: The Story of Lovers Rock
programme.desc: Lovers Rock, often dubbed â€�romantic reggaeâ€™ is a uniquely black British sound that developed in the late 70s and 80s to house parties, club and sound systems. Lovers Rock developed into a successful sound with national UK hits (Silly Games/Janet Kay) and was influential to British bands (Police, Culture Club, UB40)

programme.title: T-Junction
programme.desc: After the passing of her estranged father, Fatima makes an unlikely friend at a hospital, Maria. Bound by pain, Fatima keepisodes coming back to hear Maria's tale of the T-junction where she found love and loss in a ragtag community

programme.title: Zora Neale Hurston: Jump At The Sun
programme.desc: Zora Neale Hurston: Jump at the Sun is a moving interpretation of Zora Neale Hurston's life and career.

programme.title: The Brink
programme.desc: The Brink centers around two stranded survivors in an endless wasteland who clash as they unravel the truth of what led them there.

programme.title: WALK WITH ME
programme.desc: Walk With Me follows three women who use theater to inspire, stir and animate our democracy. While at work in prisons, schools and community centers, the film reveals that one person â€“ one artist â€“ can make a difference.

programme.title: HAIR THAT MOVES
programme.desc: Upon entering a singing competition to pay for her travels to school, a 10-year old girl tries all she can to get her short, afro to wave in the wind like her favorite pop star's hair.

programme.title: LITTLE MUSIC MANCHILD: THE STORY OF MALIK KOFI
programme.desc: The story follows an 11-year old African American Birmingham native, child prodigy who plays the cello.

programme.title: The Invisible Vegan
programme.desc: The Invisible Vegan explores the problem of unhealthy dietary patterns in the African-American community, foregrounding the health and wellness possibilities enabled by plant-based vegan diets and lifestyle choices. The documentary begins with the personal story of Jasmine Leyva, a 30-year-old black actress and filmmaker

programme.title: ROOT UP
programme.desc: Joselie lives in Guadeloupe, F.W.I. When she inherits 5 acres of land from her late father, the former seamstress becomes a farmer at age 48.

programme.title: FIRST DATE
programme.desc: A former, female boxing champion and her business partner coach are mentoring two teenage girls, best friends through their non-profit gym.

programme.title: PALM TREES DOWN 3RD ST.
programme.desc: While searching for her father, Nikki meets her half-sister Winter for the first time on the streets of San Francisco.

programme.title: The Runaways
programme.desc: Abused and neglected, Kellee attempts to run away with her boyfriend James, only to be chased and cornered by her abusive stepfather. What follows is a series of events that leads to a violent confrontation with the abusive man who terrorizes her life.

programme.title: Inns of Color
programme.desc: Inns of Color showcases a collective of five uniquely-themed African American owned bed and breakfasts."

programme.title: The Beginning And Ending Of Everything EP1
programme.desc: Angelita returns home from prison in hopes of reuniting with the young child she left behind. When she discovers the child is nowhere to be found, she goes on a quest to find the baby, her hope, and her reason for living.

programme.title: The Beginning And Ending Of Everything EP2
programme.desc: Angelita returns home from prison in hopes of reuniting with the young child she left behind. When she discovers the child is nowhere to be found, she goes on a quest to find the baby, her hope, and her reason for living.

programme.title: The Beginning And Ending Of Everything EP3
programme.desc: Angelita returns home from prison in hopes of reuniting with the young child she left behind. When she discovers the child is nowhere to be found, she goes on a quest to find the baby, her hope, and her reason for living.

programme.title: The Beginning And Ending Everything EP4
programme.desc: Angelita returns home from prison in hopes of reuniting with the young child she left behind. When she discovers the child is nowhere to be found, she goes on a quest to find the baby, her hope, and her reason for living.

programme.title: The Beginning And Ending Everything EP5
programme.desc: Angelita returns home from prison in hopes of reuniting with the young child she left behind. When she discovers the child is nowhere to be found, she goes on a quest to find the baby, her hope, and her reason for living.

programme.title: BE A FISH
programme.desc: Determined, 9 year-old Taylor buys a fish in order to practice how to swim for her â€śBig Day.â€ť

programme.title: The Whole Gritty City
programme.desc: The documentary follows kids in three bands as the directors get them ready to perform in the Mardi Gras parades, and teach them to succeed and to survive. Through moments of setback, loss, discovery, and triumph, these children and their adult leaders reveal the power and resilience of a culture.

programme.title: Malcolm X: AN OVERWHELMING INFLUENCE ON THE BLACK POWER MOVEMENT
programme.desc: This documentary will give viewers new insight into how Malcolm X changed America through revolutionary ideas, actions, and strategies: ideas that are still relevant and playing out in today's world. Concurrently, viewers get to know Malcolm X, the man, through personal accounts with friends, co-workers and family members along with engaging photos and footage.
